titleStmt.title: The casket of iewels contaynynge a playne description of morall philophie [sic], diligently and after a very easie methode declared by the well learned and famous author Cornelius Valerius: lately turned out of Latin into Englishe, by I.C.
titleStmt.author: Valerius, Cornelius, 1512-1578.

titleStmt.title: The casket of iewels contaynynge a playne description of morall philophie [sic], diligently and after a very easie methode declared by the well learned and famous author Cornelius Valerius: lately turned out of Latin into Englishe, by I.C.
titleStmt.author: Valerius, Cornelius, 1512-1578.
Chardon, John, d. 1601.

publicationStmt.publisher: By VVilliam Hovv, for Richarde Iohnes,

notesStmt.note: On K8v: This booke translated by Iohn Charlton [i.e. Chardon], late felow of Exetre Colledge, in Oxford, & now schole maister of Wyrksop, in the countie of Nottingham.
Reproduction of a photostat in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery of the original in the British Library.
Print covered on D4, H5, and H7 of the photostat; quires D and H from the British Library copy spliced at end.
